item.title: Azure Kubernetes - mind map - key concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: As part of my recent studies about Azure Kubernetes, Iâ€™ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. This mindmap serves as a visual guide to help you navigate the powerful capabilities of Azure Kubernetes and understand how its key components interrelate.
